name: Jean Anderson's Scallops, Algarve Style
keywords: bay scallops, garlic, lemon juice, main course, winter
recipeIngredient: 2 medium garlic cloves, peeled and minced

recipeInstructions.text: Stir-fry the scallops and garlic in the oil in a large, heavy skillet over high heat for three to four minutes -- just until they begin to color and have released their juices. With a slotted spoon, place the scallops in a bowl and reserve them.
Add lemon juice and cayenne to the skillet and boil with the scallop juices about two minutes until they have reduced to a glaze.
Return the scallops to the skillet together with any juices that may have accumulated in the bowl and toss a minute or two over high heat.
Add the coriander, toss again and serve.
